Reason: The configuration 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' is classified as performance-sensitive. The reason for this classification is that the 'blockWhenSyncLagsNanos' variable is calculated based on the configuration value 'DatabaseDescriptor.getPeriodicCommitLogSyncBlock()', which directly affects the waiting time in the 'maybeWaitForSync' method. This waiting time can have a notable impact on the system performance, as it determines when the commit log sync operation should occur. Therefore, any changes in the 'periodic_commitlog_sync_lag_block_in_ms' configuration can lead to significant performance variations at the system level.
